languages.text: "Еще одна темная тропа веры мон-кай, пропитанная кровью и насилием. Вы стремитесь не постичь смерть, а наложить еще больше ограничений на познание жизни. Зачем тебе это, элантах?"

traits.locale_text: "Еще одна темная тропа веры мон-кай, пропитанная кровью и насилием. Вы стремитесь не постичь смерть, а наложить еще больше ограничений на познание жизни. Зачем тебе это, элантах?"

languages.text: "Yet another trail of mon-keigh faith is soaked in blood and violence. You do not seek to comprehend death; you only add more limitations to your comprehension of life. Why would you want this, elantach?"
languages.original_text: "Еще одна темная тропа веры мон-кай, пропитанная кровью и насилием. Вы стремитесь не постичь смерть, а наложить еще больше ограничений на познание жизни. Зачем тебе это, элантах?"

traits.locale_text: "Yet another trail of mon-keigh faith is soaked in blood and violence. You do not seek to comprehend death, you only add more limitations to your comprehension of life. Why would you want this, elantach?"

"Yet another trail of mon-keigh faith is soaked in blood and violence. You do not seek to comprehend death, you only add more limitations to your comprehension of life. Why would you want this, elantach?"

"Yet another trail of mon-keigh faith is soaked in blood and violence. You do not seek to comprehend death; you only add more limitations to your comprehension of life. Why would you want this, elantach?"

"Yet another trail of mon-keigh faith is soaked in blood and violence. You do not seek to comprehend death; you only add more limitations to your comprehension of life. Why would you want this, elantach?"

"Yet another trail of mon-keigh faith is soaked in blood and violence. You do not seek to comprehend death; you only add more limitations to your comprehension of life. Why would you want this, elantach?"

"Yet another trail of mon-keigh faith is soaked in blood and violence. You do not seek to comprehend death; you only add more limitations to your comprehension of life. Why would you want this, elantach?"

languages.text: «Otro rastro de fe mon-keigh lleno de sangre y violencia. No busca entender la muerte, solo añade más limitaciones a su forma de comprender la vida. ¿Por qué quiere esto, elantach?».
languages.original_text: "Yet another trail of mon-keigh faith is soaked in blood and violence. You do not seek to comprehend death; you only add more limitations to your comprehension of life. Why would you want this, elantach?"

traits.locale_text: «Otro rastro de fe mon-keigh lleno de sangre y violencia. No busca entender la muerte, solo añade más limitaciones a su forma de comprender la vida. ¿Por qué quiere esto, elantach?».

languages.text: 「またしてもモン＝ケイの信仰の跡は、血と暴力で染められている。お前らは死を理解しようとせず、ただ生への理解にさらなる制限を加えるだけだ。なぜこんなことを望むんだ、エランタ？」
languages.original_text: "Yet another trail of mon-keigh faith is soaked in blood and violence. You do not seek to comprehend death; you only add more limitations to your comprehension of life. Why would you want this, elantach?"

traits.locale_text: 「またしてもモン＝ケイの信仰の跡は、血と暴力で染められている。お前らは死を理解しようとせず、ただ生への理解にさらなる制限を加えるだけだ。なぜこんなことを望むんだ、エランタ？」

languages.text: “不过又是猴子踏上的道路罢了，充斥着鲜血与暴力。你们并不渴望理解死亡，你们不过是强加了许多限制，让理解的道路变得更加崎岖难行。你为什么想要理解这些，外界人？”
languages.original_text: "Yet another trail of mon-keigh faith is soaked in blood and violence. You do not seek to comprehend death; you only add more limitations to your comprehension of life. Why would you want this, elantach?"

traits.locale_text: “不过又是猴子踏上的道路罢了，充斥着鲜血与暴力。你们并不渴望理解死亡，你们不过是强加了许多限制，让理解的道路变得更加崎岖难行。你为什么想要理解这些，外界人？”

languages.text: "Und wieder ist eine Spur des Chem-Pan-Sey-Glaubens in Blut und Gewalt getränkt. Ihr strebt nicht danach, den Tod zu verstehen. Ihr schränkt Euer Verständnis des Lebens nur immer weiter ein. Warum solltet Ihr das wollen, Elantach?"
languages.original_text: "Yet another trail of mon-keigh faith is soaked in blood and violence. You do not seek to comprehend death; you only add more limitations to your comprehension of life. Why would you want this, elantach?"

traits.locale_text: "Und wieder ist eine Spur des Chem-Pan-Sey-Glaubens in Blut und Gewalt getränkt. Ihr strebt nicht danach, den Tod zu verstehen. Ihr schränkt Euer Verständnis des Lebens nur immer weiter ein. Warum solltet Ihr das wollen, Elantach?"

languages.text: « Encore une fois, la piété mon-keigh est ancrée dans le sang et la violence. Vous ne cherchez pas à comprendre la mort, vous ne faites que limiter davantage votre compréhension de la vie. À quoi bon emprunter une telle voie, elantach ? »
languages.original_text: "Yet another trail of mon-keigh faith is soaked in blood and violence. You do not seek to comprehend death; you only add more limitations to your comprehension of life. Why would you want this, elantach?"

traits.locale_text: « Encore une fois, la piété mon-keigh est ancrée dans le sang et la violence. Vous ne cherchez pas à comprendre la mort, vous ne faites que limiter davantage votre compréhension de la vie. À quoi bon emprunter une telle voie, elantach ? »

languages.text: "Mon-keigh inancının kan ve şiddete bulanmış bir imtihanı daha. Ölümü kavramanın peşinde değilsin. Hayatı kavrama şekline daha fazla sınır koyuyorsun. Bunu neden istiyorsun elantach?"
languages.original_text: "Yet another trail of mon-keigh faith is soaked in blood and violence. You do not seek to comprehend death; you only add more limitations to your comprehension of life. Why would you want this, elantach?"
